review: Pretty Decent for the amount it's sold for works as advertised!
author: Christopher Jones

review: Love it!  If you are streaming to your tv, you will too!
author: JS

review: I own a ROKU 3,with which I am very happy, so I purchased the ROKU stick for another room. again, very happy. The only problem is, everything with the streaming stick seems to move a bit slower. Once the program is downloaded, everything is fine. It just takes a longer time to get there.
author: mamamike

review: does everything it says it does.
author: victor Palma

review: Stick was in perfection condition when received. The remote on the other hand looked like a battery had burst inside of it. Was going to contact company and return it but after my boyfriend looked at it an cleaned it out with baking soda paste to remove the battery acid the remote did work. Since then it's been great. Giving it 3 stars because I feel like they should make sure everything is in "Refurbished" condition, not just the stick.
author: ACH

review: Not impressed. I like Chromecast much better.
author: Mario Alexander Gonzalez

review: It's not apple TV.  Thank God

review: It's not working properly & I wyd luv to return it for a new one or my money back :(
